code: import{Button}from"@chakra-ui/button";import{Input}from"@chakra-ui/input";import{HStack}from"@chakra-ui/layout";import{Field,Form,Formik}from"formik";import{useContext}from"react";import*as Yup from"yup";import{MessagesContext,SocketContext}from"./Home";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChatBox=_ref=>{let{userid}=_ref;const{setMessages}=useContext(MessagesContext);const{socket}=useContext(SocketContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Formik,{initialValues:{message:""},validationSchema:Yup.object({message:Yup.string().min(1).max(255)}),onSubmit:(values,actions)=>{const message={to:userid,from:null,content:values.message};socket.emit("dm",message);setMessages(prevMsgs=>[message,...prevMsgs]);actions.resetForm();},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(HStack,{as:Form,w:"100%",pb:"1.4rem",px:"1.4rem",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{as:Field,name:"message",placeholder:"Type message here..",size:"lg",autoComplete:"off"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",size:"lg",colorScheme:"teal",children:"Send"})]})});};export default ChatBox;
